item.title: Decentralized social media platform Steemit grows by 1,600% in first month
item.description:
Decentralized social media platform Steemit grows by 1,600% in first month

item.title: Hong Kong Regulator Thinks Blockchain Can Curb Money Laundering
item.description:
Hong Kong Regulator Thinks Blockchain Can Curb Money Laundering

The Hong Kong Regulator has mentioned that the blockchain technology can be used to ensure proper implementation of AML and KYC regulations by the banks. Read more... Bitcoin and Bitcoin technology are like two sides of the same coin. While Bitcoin is clearly not a favorite among banks and financial institutions, its underlying Blockchain technology receives a much favorable treatment.

item.title: XMLGold's Debit Cards Can Be Charged with Bitcoin
item.description:
XMLGold's Debit Cards Can Be Charged with Bitcoin

Bitcoin Press Release: XMLGold is the place for Bitcoin and electronic currency users to exchange money. They can even choose to convert their digital currency into plastic money in no time with the XMLGold debit card. June 8, 2016, Belize City, Belize - XMLGold, the leading electronic currency platform allows people to trade almost all leading digital currencies in one place.

item.title: Canadian university pays $20K in bitcoin following ransomware attack
item.description:
Canadian university pays $20K in bitcoin following ransomware attack
